DiscordSplash Examples
######################

This section of documentation contains several examples.

.. Tip::
    it is best to know what these examples are doing before using them.

Bot examples are in the bots file, and commands (json for commands) are in the commands file.

A To-Do list for commands and bot examples that I want to add can be found on GitHub.
